College for All at Temple University

The students of Temple University are organizing a tuition freeze, and we need your help to make it happen.

Get Involved

Our Demands

Tuition Freeze

No increases in tuition for at least five years

Livable Wages

$15 minimum wage for all employees of Temple University

Repeal RCM

Temple's new budget structure is hurting our colleges and schools

Join the movement for a fairer, more affordable Temple
